data.message: Dear Facebook, please contact me. I cannot log into my facebook, could you please help me. I am stuck at Security Check, I did not receive any confirmation code, and I did try to send the message to fb number, but, it is unreachable. And my facebook page campaign is still running. Please contact me as soon as possible. Thanks

replies.message: Hi Jac. If you can't log into Facebook, please follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2s4D6Ok. -Jessica

Hi Jessica, first of all, I would like to thank you for your responding. What I am trying t mean is, I stuck at a page after I logged in. Its stated that is a security check, and it will send a confirmation code to my phone number. But, I did not receive anything until now. May I know what is the reason behind. If possible, could you please private message me? Thanks

https://www.facebook.com/checkpoint/?next
